description.value: This extension is to indicate if hierarchies were applied to a Condition Category (CC), and if applied, whether the Condition Category (CC) is superseded.

short.value: This is to indicate whether hierarchies were applied to a Condition Category (CC), and if applied, whether the Condition Category (CC) is superseded: applied-superseded|applied-not-superseded|not-applied|not-applicable

definition.value: Hierarchies applied to a Condition Category (CC) status

comment.value: This extension hierarchies were applied to a Condition Category (CC), and if applied, whether the Condition Category (CC) is superseded.

short.value: Indicate whether hierarchies were applied to a Condition Category (CC), and if applied, whether the Condition Category (CC) is superseded.
